for the most part this is the best cam on TPB righ now. very pleased with the audio and video, and the av ratings in the comments are true. so no av from me. BUT i was a little pissed that the fucking thing went blurry in the one of the most intense and plot critical parts of the movie. watch it and u can see what i mean. other cams might be a good option with that in mind. but overall a very nice copy till we can get an R5 and eventually a rip. oh and @vitormangraviti, go fuck ur self. ur like the damn critics that watched this film expecting only what you like to watch and then knocking it because u didnt see what you normally like in a film.
